content.title: Scheme for Interest Subvention to Nano Household Enterprises
content.department: Directorate of Industries & Commerce, Government of Kerala
content.details: The scheme has been introduced to promote the Nano and household enterprises in the state. It intends to provide financial assistance in the form of interest subvention to Nano and household enterprises on a reimbursement basis for the term loan availed by the unit. The units engaged in manufacturing, services as well as job work can apply under the scheme.
benefits: The unit will be eligible for interest subvention to an extent of 6% per annum for the term loan availed by the unit on a reimbursement basis for three years.
For women and SC/ST enterprises, the interest subvention will be 8% for three years.

The assistance shall be limited to the fixed percentage of the composite investment upon plant & machinery, other fixed assets including essential office equipment and Electrification cost of Land and Building shall not be included in the Fixed Capital Investment under this scheme.
eligibility: The fixed capital investment is 10 lakh or less.
Engaged in manufacturing, services, or job work.
In the white and the green category as per pollution control norms.
Connected load is 5 HP or less.
exclusions: Manufacturing units which are eligible to claim assistance under the Entrepreneur Support Scheme or any other schemes of Govt. of India or Govt. of Kerala cannot apply under the scheme.
Unit which has availed a special low rate of interest from Government Agencies are not eligible for further interest subvention under this scheme.
content.application_process: Application can be submitted online through the Official website of the Directorate of Industries & Commerce, Government of Kerala. The applicant needs to visit the official website and select the scheme from the available Online Services listed on the home page and click on the 'Apply Now' option.
documents_required: Copy of identity proof of the applicant
Bank statement file from the bank
Annexure -II- Recommendation of the Financial institution
Any other document as demanded by the recommending/sanctioning authority

faqs.question: What is the aim of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The aim of the scheme is to provide financial assistance in the form of interest subvention to Nano and household enterprises on a reimbursement basis for the term loan availed by the unit.

faqs.question: What are the objectives of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The objectives of the scheme are to generate employment opportunities in households through new self-employment projects, aggregate household/Nano units to increase potential employment, provide continuous and sustainable employment, and address specific issues not covered under similar schemes.

faqs.question: Which is the implementing department of this scheme?
faqs.answer: Director of Industries & Commerce, Government of Kerala.

faqs.question: What is the benefit of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The unit will be provided interest subvention to an extent of 6% per annum for the term loan availed by the unit on a reimbursement basis for three years.

faqs.question: What is the percentage of interest subvention given to the special category enterprises?
faqs.answer: For women and SC/ST enterprises, the interest subvention will be 8% for three years.

faqs.question: How can an applicant apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Application can be submitted online or in person to the Assistant District Industries Officer, Taluk Industries Office concerned with all supporting documents.
